guide.introduction: Using the bare minimum of ingredients, anyone can prepare this tasty pork treat from the upcraft.it blog.
guide.introduction_rendered: Using the bare minimum of ingredients, anyone can prepare this tasty pork treat from the upcraft.it blog.

lines.text: Remove any bones from the pork, and tenderize the meat using a tenderizer or a rolling pin.
lines.text_raw: Remove any bones from the pork, and tenderize the meat using a tenderizer or a rolling pin.

lines.text: Season the pork liberally with salt and pepper.
lines.text_raw: Season the pork liberally with salt and pepper.

lines.text: Dip the pork into beaten egg, and then into breadcrumbs. The egg will help the breadcrumbs to stick to the chop. Repeating the dipping a couple of times will give a thicker, more batter-like coating.
lines.text_raw: Dip the pork into beaten egg, and then into breadcrumbs. The egg will help the breadcrumbs to stick to the chop. Repeating the dipping a couple of times will give a thicker, more batter-like coating.

lines.text: Drop the coated pork into a deep-fat fryer and cook until the breadcrumbs are golden brown.
lines.text_raw: Drop the coated pork into a deep-fat fryer and cook until the breadcrumbs are golden brown.

lines.text: Resist eating the chops until they are cool.
lines.text_raw: Resist eating the chops until they are cool.

lines.text: Serve with a green salad and coleslaw for maximum taste.
lines.text_raw: Serve with a green salad and coleslaw for maximum taste.
